tasks.label: Build OS (boot + kernel) & Run
args: nasm -f bin "${fileDirname}\boot.asm" -o "${fileDirname}\boot.bin" && nasm -f bin "${fileDirname}\kernel.asm" -o "${fileDirname}\kernel.bin" && copy /b "${fileDirname}\boot.bin"+"${fileDirname}\kernel.bin" "${fileDirname}\laos.img" && qemu-system-i386 -drive format=raw,file="${fileDirname}\laos.img"
